channel.title: Private-Link on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Private-Link on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Front Door Premium now supports Azure Private Link origins in UAE North
item.description:
Azure Front Door Premium (public preview) now supports configuring Azure Private Link-enabled origins in the UAE North region.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Private Link Service Direct Connect
item.description:
Azure announced a public preview of Private Link Service Direct Connect, which removes the requirement to place provider applications behind a Standard Load Balancer. The preview simplifies how service providers expose private endpoints to consumers by allowing more direct connectivity while keeping traffic private and secure.

  • Source: Azure Updates
